sentences: Väikesed muusikas on tähtsad dünaamilised märkused.
Kunstnik kasutas väikesi heliefekte saavutamaks ilmekust.
Orkestri esituses olid paljud väikesed detailid.
context: In music terminology, 'väikesed' refers to small musical nuances or markings that add expressiveness and character to a performance. These typically include subtle tempo changes, dynamic markings (like crescendos and diminuendos), and other fine details that give the music more depth and emotional quality.
